meanings.definition: A person who habitually uses drugs, especially marijuana.
meanings.sent1: The stoners in the park were laughing and chatting.
meanings.sent2: My cousin is one of the stoners in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The stoners at the party couldn't stop giggling at everything.
meanings.sent4: The stoners in the movie looked like they were having a great time.
meanings.sent5: I saw a group of stoners sitting under the tree, passing a joint around.

meanings.definition: A group of people who regularly smoke marijuana together.
meanings.sent1: Let's invite the stoners over for a movie night.
meanings.sent2: The stoners always meet up at the same spot in the park.
meanings.sent3: The stoners decided to have a potluck dinner to celebrate 4/20.
meanings.sent4: The stoners formed a tight-knit community based on their shared interest.
meanings.sent5: The stoners' laughter echoed through the forest as they enjoyed their smoke session.
